2015-04-30: Visa reports revenue growth on a year-over-year basis: Service up 8%, Data Processing up 9%, International up 11%, and Other up 12%.
Astrological hypothesis for the results of Visa and LinkedIn at the close of New York today.

CNBC Earnings Alert: Visa Q2 EPS $0.63 vs. estimated $0.62; Q2 revenues $3.41B vs. estimated $3.34B.
Visa CFO Vasant mentions in the 2Q15 call: Weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding is 2.46 billion. The company has authorization to buy up to $3.8 billion worth of stock.
